title: Bloomberg Markets: Ex-Cartica Partner Bets on Emerging Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ex-Cartica Partner Bets on Emerging Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hema Parmar Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg Brief Discussing Carlos Botelho, a former founding partner of $3 billion Cartica Management, is betting that the hedge fund he started in April will profit from a rebound in emerging-market stocks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
